ai_prompts.title: AI 프롬프트 기록
ai_prompts.description: Claude Code, ChatGPT, Gemini 대화 기록

activity_log.title: 활동 로그
activity_log.description: 파일 변경, 창 활동, 브라우저 방문 기록

\uc624\ub298_\uc694\uc57d.sql: SELECT date(timestamp,'localtime') as date, event_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_log WHERE date(timestamp,'localtime') = date('now','localtime') GROUP BY date, event_type ORDER BY count DESC
\uc624\ub298_\uc694\uc57d.title: 오늘 활동 요약

\ud504\ub85c\uc81d\ud2b8\ubcc4_AI\uc138\.sql: SELECT project, COUNT(*) as sessions, MAX(timestamp) as last_activity FROM ai_prompts GROUP BY project ORDER BY sessions DESC
\ud504\ub85c\uc81d\ud2b8\ubcc4_AI\uc138\.title: 프로젝트별 AI 세션

\ucd5c\uadfc_\ud30c\uc77c\ubcc0\uacbd.sql: SELECT datetime(timestamp,'localtime') as time, file_path, event_type FROM file_events ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 50
\ucd5c\uadfc_\ud30c\uc77c\ubcc0\uacbd.title: 최근 파일 변경 50건

\uc77c\ubcc4_\ud65c\ub3d9\ub7c9.sql: SELECT date(timestamp,'localtime') as date, COUNT(*) as events FROM activity_log GROUP BY date ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 30
\uc77c\ubcc4_\ud65c\ub3d9\ub7c9.title: 최근 30일 일별 활동량
